		Question: who was stephen r covey
		Answer:
answer: Stephen R. Covey was an author, speaker, educator, businessman, motivational speaker, personal development, and leadership expert. He was the author of the best-selling book The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People and co-founded FranklinCovey.
